q: Talk to yourself like you would to someone you love.
Promise me you'll always remember: You're braver than you believe, and stronger than you seem, and smarter than you think.

You have brains in your head. You have feet in your shoes. You can steer yourself any direction you choose. You're on your own. And you know what you know. And YOU are the one who'll decide where to go..
We all can dance when we find music that we love
It's not what you are that is holding you back. It's what you think you are not.

As I began to love myself I freed myself of anything that is no good for my health – food, people, things, situations, and everything that drew me down and away from myself. At first I called this attitude a healthy egoism. Today I know it is love of oneself
Hey Little Fighter, Soon Things Will Be Brighter
If not now, when? If not you, who?
